feed.title: PRU
feed.subtitle: Performance monitoring data, analyses and visualizations for Eurocontrol's 41 Member States.

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Dec 2017.

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to Dec 2017 (when applicable).
  2. NEW: The interactive ACE online dashboard is now available online.
    The new interactive online dashboard enables interested stakeholders to access the latest available ACE data and analysis. Using the interactive functionalities of the dashboard, stakeholders can design and customise specific analyses and presentations covering the 2002-2015 period.

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to June 2017.

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: The data download files have been updated up to June 2017 (when applicable).
  2. Update: The Performance Review Commission (PRC) quarterly online review - Jan-Jun 2017 is now available.
  3. Just printed: Printed copies of the PRR 2016 are now available. Copies can be obtained by completing the online order form.
  4. Just published: The study on the Acceptable Level of Safety Performance (ALoSP) implementation in EUROCONTROL Member States has just been published.
    The ALoSP survey and analysis study provides a comprehensive understanding of the ALoSP concept and its current implementation status in EUROCONTROL Member States in terms of the concept definition, scope, and implementation challenges.

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to May 2017.

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: The data download files have been updated up to May 2017 (when applicable).
  2. Update: As of this release, the download files with the old ATFM delay calculation as of 04 April (version 1) were discontinued.
  3. New: The complexity data as of January 2017 are now based on the new BADA version (3.13.1, previously it was 3.6).
  4. Just published: The 2015 ATM Cost-Effectiveness (ACE) Benchmarking Report has just been published.
    The report gives factual data and an analysis of 38 European Air Navigation Service Providers’ (ANSPs) cost-effectiveness and productivity for the year 2015.
    It includes a high-level trend analysis for the years 2010-2015.

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Feb 2017.

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to Feb 2017 (when applicable).
  2. New: The Performance Review Commission (PRC) quarterly online review has been launched.
  3. Just published: The draft final Performance Review Report 2016 is now available for stakeholder comments and feedback.
    The deadline for receipt of comments is 16:00 on Friday 07 April 2017.

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Jan 2017.

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to Jan 2017 (when applicable.)
  2. Just published: Two technical reports on Vertical Flight Efficiency one on en-route vertical flight efficiency (Peeters and Guastalla 2017) and the other on vertical flight efficienty during climb and descent (Peeters and Guastalla 2017).
  3. Just published: Review of civil military coordination and cooperation arrangements in Member States (EUROCONTROL/PRC 2016).

Reference

  1. Peeters, Sam, and Guglielmo Guastalla. 2017. “Analysis of En-Route Vertical Flight Efficiency.” 00-04. Eurocontrol/PRU. PDF.

    Abstract: Description of the conceptual, matematical, and platform independent approach for the analysis of en-route vertical flight efficiency, as used by the Performance Review Unit of EUROCONTROL

  2. ———. 2017. “Analysis of Vertical Flight Efficiency during Climb and Descent.” 00-04. Eurocontrol/PRU. PDF.

    Abstract: Description of the conceptual, matematical, and platform independent approach for the analysis of vertical flight efficiency during the climb and descent phases of flights, as used by the Performance Review Unit of EUROCONTROL

  3. EUROCONTROL/PRC. 2016. “Review of Civil Military Coordination and Cooperation Arrangements.” Eurocontrol/PRC. PDF.

    Abstract: Summary of the feedback received from civil and military stakeholders in order to highlight possible deficiencies and inconsistencies in the way civil military cooperation and coordination is performed throughout the Member States.The results are based on a survey carried out between October 2015 and March 2016.

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Nov 2016.

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to Nov 2016 (when applicable)
  2. Just published: U.S. – Europe comparison of ANS cost-efficiency trends (2006-2014).
    The report is a factual high-level comparison of Air Navigation Services (ANS) provision costs in Europe and the United States of America (US), based on comparable data and the well-established ACE economic performance framework. It is an update of the comparison of ANS cost-efficiency trends published in 2013 and focuses on the period from 2006 to 2014. The report was prepared by the EUROCONTROL Performance Review Unit (PRU) on behalf of the European Commission (EC).

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)

entry.title: Release Notes
entry.content:
Data updates up to Oct 2016.

The following changes have been delivered in this release:

  1. Update: Data download files updated up to Oct 2016 (when applicable)
  2. New: ATFM delay data for different versions following software release 20.0 of the Network Manager available in the download area
  3. New: Erfurt (EDDE) airport included in ASMA data
  4. New: Erfurt (EDDE) airport and Saarbrucken (EDDR) airport included in Taxi out data
  5. Update: ATFM delay due to LFDSNA related ATFM regulations added

Release Notes was originally published by European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL) on PRU

author.name: European Organisation for the Safety of Air Navigation (EUROCONTROL)
